headline: Columbia Threadneedle Investments Selects State Street as Global Back Office Provider
summary: BOSTON, August 29, 2025--Columbia Threadneedle Investments today announced that it has selected State Street Corporation as the service provider for a unified and outsourced global back office. State Street will provide fund accounting, administration and custody services for Columbia Threadneedle’s pooled funds, including ETFs, in the U.S. and Europe, drawing on State Street’s significant capabilities and broad industry experience.

headline: Custody Bank Stocks Q2 Highlights: Ameriprise Financial (NYSE:AMP)
summary: As the Q2 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the custody bank industry, including Ameriprise Financial (NYSE:AMP) and its peers.
